summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to where they can save the most money, address issues on our High-Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 61 priority open recommendations for the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) as of May 2021. For example, HHS should develop a...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Health and Human Services
